conversation.text: Based on the user's preference cues and genre information, I would recommend "White Fang". Directed by Emir Kusturica, this classic adventure film is set during a period of great change in the world, including the emergence of new political ideologies, as well as the growing influence of technology and modernization in various parts of the world. The story follows two young men named Jack and Tom, who are on a journey through the wilderness, with the goal of finding gold that they had heard rumors about being buried deep beneath the surface of the earth. Along the way, they encounter many challenges and obstacles, including harsh weather conditions, fierce wild animals, treacherous terrain and rocks, as well as other people who may be willing to help them along their journey, but may also be interested in taking advantage of them or using them against them.
